xml.data:
Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 5 Upādinnattika » 5.7 Pañhāvāra » 5.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 5.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Magga
Upādinnattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Magga
78.
2720Upādinnupādāniyo dhammo upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa maggapaccayena paccayo—  upādinnupādāniyāni maggaṅgāni sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ maggapaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (1)
2721Upādinnupādāniyo dhammo anupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa maggapaccayena paccayo—  upādinnupādāniyāni maggaṅgāni cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ maggapaccayena paccayo. (2)
2722Upādinnupādāniyo dhammo upādinnupādāniyassa ca anupādinnupādāniyassa ca dhammassa maggapaccayena paccayo—  upādinnupādāniyāni maggaṅgāni sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ maggapaccayena paccayo. (3)
2723Anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo anupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa maggapaccayena paccayo—  anupādinnupādāniyāni maggaṅgāni sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ maggapaccayena paccayo. (1)
2724Anupādinnaanupādāniyo dhammo anupādinnaanupādāniyassa dhammassa maggapaccayena paccayo—  anupādinnaanupādāniyāni maggaṅgāni sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ maggapaccayena paccayo. (1)
2725Anupādinnaanupādāniyo dhammo anupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa maggapaccayena paccayo—  anupādinnaanupādāniyāni maggaṅgāni cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ maggapaccayena paccayo. (2)
2726Anupādinnaanupādāniyo dhammo anupādinnupādāniyassa ca anupādinnaanupādāniyassa ca dhammassa maggapaccayena paccayo—  anupādinnaanupādāniyāni maggaṅgāni sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ maggapaccayena paccayo. (3)
<< Jhānaup Sampayutta >>
